text: This is a list of fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Togo. __NOTOC__ == List of fossiliferous stratigraphic units == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Formation !! Period !! Fossils !! class="unsortable" | Notes |- | Tabligbo Limestone || style="background-color: ;" | Thanetian || Eponides pseudoelevatus, Lenticulina midwayensis, Neonesidea illaroides, Paracypris sokotoensis, P. trosliensis, Platella ewekoroensis, Togocyamus seefriedi, Trachyleberis teiskotensis, Soudanella laciniosa, Bairdia sp., Bythocypris sp., Cibicides sp., Discorbis sp., Eponides sp., Lithothamnion sp., Morozovella sp., Operculina sp., Quinqueloculina sp., Ranikothalia sp., Textularia sp., Ostreidae indet. || align=center | Togocyamus Limestone at Fossilworks.orgCompact slab at Fossilworks.orgGlauconitic biomicrite at Fossilworks.org |- |} == See also == * Lists of fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Africa * Geology of Togo == References == == Further reading == * A. title: List of fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Togo
